# multiplayerSessionFailed(reason:)

**Instance Method**

We failed to start or join a new multiplayer session or had to terminate a previously started multiplayer session.

## Declaration

```swift
func multiplayerSessionFailed(reason: any Error)
```

## Handling errors

- **didRejectPlayer(_:reason:)**: A player that tried to join was rejected or a player that previously joined our game was ejected.

items.description: A player that tried to join was rejected or a player that previously joined our game was ejected.
items.name: didRejectPlayer(_:reason:)
